structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Annual report on committed children -- Contents.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 33, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 47, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/20/2005). KRS 194B.360 was repealed and reenacted as a new section of KRS Chapter 194A by 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 33, and repealed by 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 674, and has been codified as this section of KRS Chapter 194A.
